title: How Tech is Changing the Farming Industry
itunes:title: How Tech is Changing the Farming Industry
description:
Viren Popli, CEO at Mahindra Agriculture North America, discusses how technology is changing the farming industry.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.
